item.title: Release control process for ChatOps driven CI/CD methodologies
item.author: sec.gary@gmail.com (GaryZhu)
item.description: Previously we discussed how to improve our CI/CD process through the ChatOps tool Bamboo-on-Teams. One command of it is to release a set of services in sequential batches.
